entry.title: People don't leave people if they really are in love
entry.summary:
Author: hxlfbloodprincess

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,886Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Lucy knew she was going to be stood up, that was just how internet dates went. It didn’t really matter. The date wasn’t exactly the point. It was more about the dating. Sure, that sounded like the exact same thing, but the two were fundamentally different. At least to Lucy. She was still getting used to the idea of not dating Tim if she was completely honest with herself, and this was risk-free. Firehose was not going to show up.ORLucy is trying to get over Tim and Buck is trying to move on after Eddie moved to Texas. Somehow their paths cross and while sparks may not exactly be flying, maybe there's something else between them? Maybe they could be friends?

entry.title: Champagne Problems
entry.summary:
Author: ash_ptv

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,352Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 4

Summary: Following the events of Eddie leaving for Texas and Buck's one night stand with Tommy, Buck has to face the reality of not only living in LA without Eddie but living in what was Eddie's old house. Maddie has already encouraged Buck to learn to be alone and stay away from relationships knowing how her little brother can get when he is upset and not thinking clearly. Buck seems to be taking Eddie's advice to "not make everything about him" to heart and is avoiding sharing details of his personal life and struggle with his crew. Will this be a chance for Buck to get back together with his most recent ex? Or will Buck look more into the idea that his feelings for Eddie aren't as platonic as he may think as Tommy and Maddie have suggested.Eddie is finally back with Chris and he has a lot of time while job searching to focus on how he feels now that Buck isn't 20 minutes away anymore. Is Chris really satisfied in his life with Texas now that it is not just a place he could run from his dad? Why does Chris feel like part of his family is still in California, and not the family he was running from? How will Eddie feel now that Buck seems to be talking with Tommy again?

entry.title: i know it's crazy, but what if it's right?
entry.summary:
Author: lauriesamy

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,138Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: “Tommy actually thought that you and I–” Buck lets out a small chuckle. “That I was in love with you, which is crazy.” Eddie’s eyes widen on the other side of the call, he stops laughing. Buck feels his breath hitch in his throat.He’s said too much. Stupid.Eddie breaks the silence, he hesitates before whispering, “Is that so crazy?”Buck fears he has stopped breathing for a moment. “What?” he asks quietly.“Is it?” he whispers again, his face moving closer to the phone until it fills Buck’s screen.Buck shakes his head, this isn’t real. “Eddie. You’re straight—I wouldn’t–”“But what if?” Eddie cuts him off.OR: Buck is not stupid, he knows exactly who Tommy meant by competition. He knows he’s in love with Eddie, he just can’t admit that to Tommy or Maddie, but maybe he can tell Eddie himself.8x11 coda

entry.title: home (is where the heart is)
entry.summary:
Author: rizcriz

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,260Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 28

Summary: The second the words leave his mouth, Eddie wishes he could claw them back in. Reach out into the space between them—that chasm of distance that’s been building over the last several weeks. They’re twenty feet apart in literal terms, Buck’s sitting at the table and Eddie’s at the top of the stairs, clutching his hands in front of himself, but the entire world is separating them because—Because.Fuck.He takes a step towards him, the rest of the firehouse falling silent as they all turn to look at him. That easy smile that was on Buck’s lips, that soft hope that lined his statement fading into obscurity as Eddie’s words ring vibrant and angry over it all.Buck blinks, tilting his head like he doesn’t quite understand, and how could he? How could he understand? He never fucking gets it.--Or Buck wants to start a family, but he already has one.

entry.title: The Wild Boy
entry.summary:
Author: Warlock_Nerd

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,568Chapters: 19/28Kudos: 512

Summary: The 118 get a call to some nearby woodlands where the police are waiting for their assistance. Athena tells them that they need to help with a little boy that had gotten his leg stuck in a beartrap. All seems simple but then she tells them that the boy is a feral child, animalistic and frightened, and was throwing rocks at people who tried to get closer. Buck and Eddie are tasked to get him to safety.The boy is scared of everything around him, people, sounds, objects, the wind, the smells. Terror is all the boy knew until he found something he wasn’t scared of.And its name was Evan Buckley. :3Warnings - Heavy descriptions of medical trauma, child abuse, neglect and injury.Queue found family, Christopher being an amazing big brother and the 118 being the best family in the entire world. :3

entry.title: down for the count (drowning in it)
entry.summary:
Author: oneofthesirens

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,539Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 51

Summary: “But then, Ravi, he said the most insane shit to me the next morning,” Buck says, his scowl becoming more pronounced. “Like it actually really pissed me off.”And — despite himself — Ravi’s intrigued. It’s not his fault, he just likes gossip. “What did he say?” Ravi asks, finally looking away from the hose.Buck blinks at him for a moment and the nail picking intensifies. Ravi has a bad feeling about this.“He thinks Eddie was his competition,” Buck finally says. “Like I’m in love with Eddie, or something. Isn’t that crazy?”Oh. Oh, this is really bad actually. Or: Ravi has to deal with Buck spiralling about being in love with Eddie. He’s mainly just worried if he’s going to survive his next shift.

entry.title: Fighting To Hold On
entry.summary:
Author: untoldchaos

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,778Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 17

Summary: Evan 'Buck' Buckley doesn't think of himself as a violent person.He forgets to remind himself of this fact as he draws his fist back and then hooks it around to strike his opponent.The returning blows come as a flurry of movement. First comes the impact, then a tingling sensation, and finally a throbbing pain radiating from Buck's jaw up to his temple and through his entire skull. He stumbles back; vision hazy, the faint metallic taste of blood in his mouth. Another hit lands before he has a chance to re-orientate himself, sending him falling backwards- hard.OrEddie has left for El Paso, so Buck needs a new hobby to keep distracted.Baking won't cut it.The solution is beginner MMA, obviously.And to make things more interesting, Buck's trainer shares a striking resemblance to his best friend.

entry.title: Buck Has Trouble Donating
entry.summary:
Author: hardlynoticeable

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,281Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 142

Summary: Five weeks of abstinence, four failed appointments, and a frantic sprint to the clinic, and he was finally in the room. He had the sample cup and the magazines and instructions to "take his time, catch his breath, no rush". But the nice clinic nurse didn't have Connor and Kameron counting on him, waiting anxiously on his sperm. And with his luck getting to this point, he probably didn't have long before something went wrong. There was absolutely a rush.And he couldn't. Get. Hard.
